BattleEffectText.Name: Stupefied
BattleEffectText.Desc: Lasts 2 Scenes. Uncontrollable. Targets allies. Upon losing a clash, takes bonus Stagger damage equal to 5% of Max Stagger Resist. If the character is Staggered, this status is removed at the end of the Scene, and the character recovers from Stagger next Scene.
